## References

### Data

_Minnesota Management and Budget_, _Transparency MN_ (2020). ["Payroll Data"](https://mn.gov/mmb/transparency-mn/payrolldata.jsp). <-- Downloadable data files available here!  (This tutorial uses the 2019 file.)


### Learning the statistical theory

McElreath, R. (2020). [_Statistical Rethinking: A Bayesian Course with Examples in R and Stan_, 2nd Ed](https://www.routledge.com/Statistical-Rethinking-A-Bayesian-Course-with-Examples-in-R-and-STAN/McElreath/p/book/9780367139919). CRC Press. 

McElreath, R. (2019). [Statistical Rethinking Winter 2019](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLDcUM9US4XdNM4Edgs7weiyIguLSToZRI) [You Tube]. Lectures to focus on:

- [Lecture 15 - "Models with Memory"](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AALYPv5xSos&list=PLDcUM9US4XdNM4Edgs7weiyIguLSToZRI&index=15)

- [Lecture 16 - "Multilevel Models 2"](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZG3Oe35R5sY&list=PLDcUM9US4XdNM4Edgs7weiyIguLSToZRI&index=16)

- [Lecture 17 - "Adventures in Covariance"](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yfXpjmWgyXU&list=PLDcUM9US4XdNM4Edgs7weiyIguLSToZRI&index=17)

- [Lecture 18 - "Further Adventures in Covariance"](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e5cgiAGBKzI&list=PLDcUM9US4XdNM4Edgs7weiyIguLSToZRI&index=18)

Erickson, R. _Data Camp_. ["Hierarchical and Mixed Effects Models in R"](https://learn.datacamp.com/courses/hierarchical-and-mixed-effects-models-in-r).
